DOC.brief_summary: This study compares analgesic efficacy, and safety of three different doses of peri-operative pregabaline to placebo following radical cystectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Peri-operative Pregabalin After Radical Cystectomy
DOC.criteria: Sixty patients between the ages of 18 and 60 years. American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) III physical status. undergoing radical cystectomy under general anesthesia.
